title: Constructivist-Based Collaborative Curriculum for Academic English Proficiency Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Customized curriculum for adult ESL learners preparing for U.S. university admission, emphasizing situational language training via VR simulations in a BYOD environment and collaborative learning centered on peer feedback.

learning_goals: Deliver clear and logically structured English presentations of five minutes or longer in academic settings
Accurately summarize core concepts from academic papers and lecture materials at 80% or higher comprehension rates
Through collaboration with peers, learners can complete an academic writing assignment (5-7 pages) and reduce grammatical/vocabulary errors by 90%.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
